name: Lifespan 5seconds
description: Lifespan 5seconds is a stage clear action puzzle game made by PixelGameMakerMV. While generating a block with a lifespan of 5 seconds Try on all 50 stages!
minimum_requirements: OS: windows7,8,10 Processor: SSE2 Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: windows7,8,10 Processor: SSE2 Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
